glsa.title: feh: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in feh, the worst of which leading to remote passive code execution.

background.p: feh is a fast, lightweight imageviewer using imlib2.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in feh. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A malicious entity might entice a user to visit a URL using the --wget-timestamp option, thus executing arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters; a malicious local user could perform a symlink attack and overwrite arbitrary files.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All feh users should upgrade to the latest version:
